Introducing the Ghost 50 BEO, a cutting-edge rifle crafted by the renowned Ghost Armory, setting new standards in firepower and precision. Chambered in the formidable .50 Beowulf caliber, this weapon seamlessly merges raw strength with finesse. The Ghost 50 BEO boasts a sleek and ergonomic design, featuring advanced materials that enhance durability without compromising on weight. Equipped with state-of-the-art optics and an adjustable stock, this rifle ensures unparalleled accuracy even in challenging conditions. Whether for long-range engagements or close-quarter combat, the Ghost 50 BEO stands as a testament to Ghost Armory's commitment to innovation, providing operators with an exceptional and reliable tool that dominates the battlefield with unrivaled power and efficiency.

 %c[d_purple] - %c[ui_gray_2] Suppressor: .50 Suppressor.

Introducing the MDR Bullpup Rifle in .50 Beowulf crafted by the renowned Ghost Armory, a compact powerhouse that combines the agility of the bullpup design with the raw stopping power of the .50 Beowulf cartridge. Designed for versatility and performance, this rifle boasts a shorter overall length for enhanced maneuverability in tight spaces without compromising on barrel length or ballistic effectiveness. The MDR's ergonomic features and advanced materials ensure comfortable handling and precision accuracy, making it suitable for a variety of applications, from hunting to tactical operations. Whether you're navigating dense brush or engaging targets at long range, the MDR in .50 Beowulf is a formidable choice, delivering uncompromising performance and reliability in a sleek, modern package.
